field.label: Enable CARP Failover
field.help: This will activate the repeater service only on the master device.

field.label: Listen Interfaces
field.help: At least 2 interfaces must be selected. The maximum number of supported interfaces by the daemon is 5.

field.label: Block List
field.help: Optionally to blacklist an entire subnet, (eg. 192.168.1.1/24).
